text: The Tomb of Hadi Sabzavari is built by the Qajar dynasty and is the site of the Hadi Sabzavari burial. This building is located in Sabzevar, Iran. == Gallery == File:Mausoleum of Haj Molla Hadi Sabzevari 01.jpg File:Mausoleum of Hadi Sabzavari Probably in 1970s.jpg File:Hakim Sabzevari Tomb 1.jpg File:Hakim Sabzevari Tomb.jpg == Sources == Category:National Works of Iran Category:Mausoleums in Iran Category:Tourist attractions in Razavi Khorasan Province
title: Tomb of Hadi Sabzevari
